channel.title: Internet on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in Internet on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: Using a Netgear N600 DGND3700v1 to extend a home network
item.description: I've brought a brand new Asus RT-AC66U modem/router and decided that to use my old Netgear N600 ADSL modem/router DGND3700v1 to extend my home network and expand my wireless network.

item.title: Saturday Humour - Size of blogging [infographic]
item.description: Saturday's usual weekly comic has been moved aside this week for something more important.

item.title: Saturday Funny - a guide to the internet
item.description: So how would you explain the internet to a 19th century Dickensian street urchin.

item.title: South Africa - 5 million online and growing
item.description: South Africa is one of the fastest growing markets for mobile and internet usage is also growing rapidly.

item.title: We are watching you and reading your texts and emails
item.description: The UK for along time has been a country full of honours and award systems — the most CCTV cameras comes to mind and from today it seems that the UK Government believes that for your safety, they will need to record details and the contents of every SMS, email, voicemails and phone calls.

item.title: BBC iPlayer steams ahead with internet usage
item.description: Comment: Internet traffic to the iPlayer site is growing rapidly supported by outside advertising posterboards as well as reminders during TV advertising.
